description:
TL;DR

I’m a web developer and designer based in Lebanon, Ohio. I’ve been building and managing Technology Operations for over 6 years! I use HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build effective and fast web apps that provide a stage for what my clients have to sale.

Currently my tech stack is:

  • HTML, CSS, and React JS for the front end.

  • Ubuntu, Docker, Node, MySQL, and a custom build of Ghost CMS for the backend.

The Juicy Details:

My passion for computers started when I was a little kid, and grew from there. In 2013 I started volunteering at my Church recording and editing videos, which over the years led to designing graphics. This urge to be creative then led to me taking a pivotal step, by attending Butler Tech, D. Russel Lee during my Junior and Senior years of High School. In 2016, I graduated with both High School Credentials and a Certificate of Digital Media.

After graduating High School I took the normal route of applying for colleges. Landing on my local community college as the best option. While attending my first year in 2017, I was introduced to Web Development. Shortly thereafter, I was “hooked”.

Goals for 2020:

I believe that having accountability is the best thing you can do; Which is why I'm displaying all of my goals and progress for the year 2020.

  • Write 3 Tutorials

  • Allow McKnight Digital public access — Update, Live for Public access.

  • Read 5 books — Update: Read, 2/5

  • Begin advanced Cybersecurity concepts

  • Put Linux (Kali or Debian) on a Chromebook — Update, Purchased Chromebook
cta: To get started, import this site into Forestry or checkout the repository here.
